<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->

Backports are good, accounted for in release notes, and client versions and dates correct.

verification.payload:
tree a5625868eda738bc7ca7a3614840182ae95706f2
parent ee048cd32b562688c180a2752b8f4b4c757edb83
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1714639503 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1759916491 +0100

depends: fix Qt macOS build with Clang 18

Patch Qts internal libpng to resolve the failure.

I would like to have this patched, so we can continue working on the
removal of `FORCE_USE_SYSTEM_CLANG`. Otherwise builds will be broken using
the default clang (18) on the current Ubuntu LTS (24.04).

Github-Pull: #30198
Rebased-From: 0a3631fc352eda849290db940844e5ef723436df

events.message:
depends: fix Qt macOS build with Clang 18

Patch Qts internal libpng to resolve the failure.

I would like to have this patched, so we can continue working on the
removal of `FORCE_USE_SYSTEM_CLANG`. Otherwise builds will be broken using
the default clang (18) on the current Ubuntu LTS (24.04).

Github-Pull: #30198
Rebased-From: 0a3631fc352eda849290db940844e5ef723436df

verification.payload:
tree b93d68b52627ed6d4a0b67aa7e5a3cbf4f8dac53
parent 640cc72577f7baabe43d83ad9883ac6ef1b58d9b
author Martin Zumsande <mzumsande@gmail.com> 1757712544 -0400
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1759916491 +0100

net: Do not apply whitelist permission to onion inbounds

Tor inbound connections do not reveal the peer's actual network address.
Therefore do not apply whitelist permissions to them.

Co-authored-by: Vasil Dimov <vd@FreeBSD.org>

Github-Pull: #33395
Rebased-From: f563ce90818d486d2a199439d2f6ba39cd106352
